name: starter-pwa
description: PWA Starter Kit for Enonic XP Platform

scripts.train-models: cd rasa && python -m rasa_nlu.train -c nlu_model_config.json --fixed_model_name current
scripts.train-stories: cd rasa && python -m rasa_core.train -s data/stories.md -d domain.yml -o models/stories
scripts.rasa-server: cd rasa && python -m rasa_core.server -d models/stories -u models/nlu/default/current -o logs/server.log

author: Alan Semenov
